CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. 40, reads: "Mayor Talks - Mayor David L. Lawrence of Pittsburgh gives his view on sports to Pitt University's greatest runner, Arnie Sowell, left, and Duquesne University's All-American Si Green at a recent banquet held by the Dapper Dan Club. Both athletes were honored for their standout contributions to sports. - Harris Photo."David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of runner Arnold "Arnie" Sowell, basketball player Sihugo "Si" Green, and Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, at Dapper Dan banquet
